name: Jamestown Community Center
description: Jamestown's mission is to help children, youth and their families develop and realize their full potential as empowered, productive, and active members of their community. Jamestown, a Mission District based organization, envisions a future where all of San Francisco's children, youth, and families, particularly those from underserved populations, will have access to the opportunities they need to thrive and to create a city that is safe, equitable, interconnected, and community-led. Today, Jame
fullDescription: Jamestown's mission is to help children, youth and their families develop and realize their full potential as empowered, productive, and active members of their community. Jamestown, a Mission District based organization, envisions a future where all of San Francisco's children, youth, and families, particularly those from underserved populations, will have access to the opportunities they need to thrive and to create a city that is safe, equitable, interconnected, and community-led. Today, Jame
whatTheyOffer: Jamestown Community Center (JCC) is a Youth Development organization based in the Mission District of San Francisco. JCC creates healthier communities and enriches the lives of our underserved youth and their families, by cultivating academics, sports, Social-Emotional Learning, and ladership Development.
